title: 104: Cubone
author: Chris Taylor
description:
Cubone is soooo KAWAII, albeit alone and sad – We still had fun recording this episode of Magmar Sucks!  

Hosts: [Chris](https://twitter.com/DaLiquidSword), [Mark](https://www.twitch.tv/robobobatron), [Aleksandar](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC56emXYp1pHXL2E9SLcYisw), [John](https://www.youtube.com/user/Haklex255)

For more episodes and the full ranking list visit [Magmar Sucks](http://www.magmarsucks.com) on the web.

For more on the Pokemon in this episode check out their [Bulbapedia page](http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Cubone)
